code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddTeacher=()=>{const[name,setName]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");const response=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/staff/add",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":`Bearer ${token}`},body:JSON.stringify({name,email,password,role:"teacher"})});const data=await response.json();if(response.ok){setMessage("Teacher added successfully!");setName("");setEmail("");setPassword("");}else{setMessage(data.message||"Error adding teacher");}}catch(error){console.error("Error:",error);setMessage("An error occurred");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-center h-screen bg-gray-200",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-6 rounded shadow-md w-96",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Add Teacher"}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true,className:"w-full p-2 border rounded mb-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),className:"w-full p-2 border rounded mb-2",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"w-full p-2 border rounded mb-2",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"w-full bg-blue-500 text-white p-2 rounded",children:"Add Teacher"})]})]})});};export default AddTeacher;
